## RecordProperties type

Extracts the underlying types from properties supplied to [recordType()](./paratype.recordtype.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RecordProperties<T extends Record<string, Type<any>>, O extends (keyof T)[]> = ({
    [P in Exclude<keyof T, O[number]>]: TypeOf<T[P]>;
} & {
    [P in O[number]]?: TypeOf<T[P]>;
});
```
<b>References:</b> [Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->, [TypeOf](./paratype.typeof.md)
